attributes.action: Support the Release of Zarganar for crimes of Conscience
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Zarganar Is a Burmese Comedian, Imprisoned for 45 years for daring to speak out against the military Junta, in protest of their handling of the effects of the cyclone that hit it.

We ask that the government puts pressure on the government of Burma to release prisoners of conscience, including zarganar.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
